mapper.select: SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE perm_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{permCode}, '%') AND tenant_id = #{tenantId} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE perm_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{permName}, '%') AND tenant_id = #{tenantId} ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT p.* FROM permissions p INNER JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY p.id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM permissions p INNER JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.id DESC
